          // --- LOGIC ---
          const stepsContainer = document.getElementById('steps-container');
          const visualContainer = document.getElementById('visual-container');
          const visualContent = document.getElementById('visual-content');
          
          // Render Left Steps
          stepsData.forEach(step => {
            const stepEl = document.createElement('div');
            stepEl.className = `
              step-card 
              step-inactive
              mb-24 lg:mb-[70vh] last:mb-0
              p-8 md:p-10 rounded-3xl 
              border border-glass-border bg-glass backdrop-blur-md
              snap-start scroll-mt-24
              transition-all duration-500
            `;
            stepEl.setAttribute('data-step-id', step.id);
            
            stepEl.innerHTML = `
              <div class="flex items-center gap-3 mb-6">
                <span class="font-mono text-xs text-cyan-400 tracking-widest border border-cyan-400/30 px-3 py-1 rounded-full bg-cyan-400/10">
                  ${step.badgeText}
                </span>
              </div>
              <h2 class="text-3xl md:text-5xl font-bold mb-6 text-white leading-tight font-sans">
                ${step.title}
              </h2>
              <p class="text-lg text-slate-300 leading-relaxed font-light">
                ${step.description}
              </p>
            `;
            stepsContainer.appendChild(stepEl);
          });

          // Update Visual Panel
          function updateVisualPanel(stepIndex) {
            const step = stepsData[stepIndex];
            if (!step) return;

            // Fade out
            visualContent.style.opacity = '0';
            visualContent.style.transform = 'scale(0.95) translateY(10px)';
            
            setTimeout(() => {
              // Change Content
              visualContent.innerHTML = step.visualHTML;
              
              // Fade in
              visualContent.style.opacity = '1';
              visualContent.style.transform = 'scale(1) translateY(0)';
            }, 300);

            // Active State styling for Left Cards
            document.querySelectorAll('.step-card').forEach((el, idx) => {
                if (idx === stepIndex) {
                    el.classList.remove('step-inactive');
                    el.classList.add('step-active');
                } else {
                    el.classList.remove('step-active');
                    el.classList.add('step-inactive');
                }
            });
          }

          // Observer
          // 1. Determine Screen Size
          // If screen is narrow (mobile), use a huge detection zone (-10%).
          // If screen is wide (desktop), use the tight laser focus zone (-40%).
          const isMobile = window.innerWidth < 1024;
          const observerMargin = isMobile ? '-10% 0px -10% 0px' : '-40% 0px -40% 0px';

          // 2. Create Observer with dynamic margin
          const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
            entries.forEach((entry) => {
              if (entry.isIntersecting) {
                const id = parseInt(entry.target.getAttribute('data-step-id'));
                updateVisualPanel(id);
              }
            });
          }, { root: null, rootMargin: observerMargin, threshold: 0.1 });

          // 3. Attach Observer & Click Listeners
          document.querySelectorAll('.step-card').forEach((el) => {
            observer.observe(el);
            
            // Extra Mobile Fix: Tap a card to force it to light up
            el.addEventListener('click', () => {
                const id = parseInt(el.getAttribute('data-step-id'));
                updateVisualPanel(id);
            });
          });

          // Initialize first step
          updateVisualPanel(0);

          // Scroll Down Button
          document.getElementById('start-btn').addEventListener('click', () => {
            document.getElementById('story-start').scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' });
          });
        </script>
